ctx: intros i P Q R S genPcP Cb_incl HinP HinR a HinQ.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable eqA_dec (no bound variables at all in the expression).

original: intros i P Q R S genPcP Cb_incl HinP HinR a HinQ. apply Cb_incl with (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) (a:=a). - apply HinP. apply HinQ. - apply HinR.
